title: Library Search Vocabulary (German)
description: German vocabulary for academic library research: Katalog (catalog), Bibliothek (library), Autor/Autorin (author), Herausgeber/Hrsg. (editor), Monographie (monograph), Sammelband (edited volume), Auflage (edition), überarbeitet (revised), Verlag (publisher), erscheinen (to publish), Titel (title), nachschlagen (look up)
source_reference: Übung A Task 1-2 - Literature search and classification
